column12: Profile oil removing mechanism for aluminum alloy machining process
column13: The invention provides a profile oil removal mechanism for an aluminum alloy machining process. The profile oil removal mechanism comprises a bottom plate and a top plate, and a plurality of supporting rods are fixedly connected between the bottom plate and the top plate; by arranging the conveying pipe, a worker can place a plurality of tubular or columnar aluminum alloy sections in the conveying pipe, the aluminum alloy sections are vertically arranged in the conveying pipe, the box body is moved, so that the box body is located under the conveying pipe, the shell can abut against the conveying structure, the conveying structure can put the sections in the conveying pipe into the shell one by one, and the conveying pipe can convey the sections into the shell. A worker can start the clamping structure, the clamping structure clamps the sectional material, the arranged clamping structure can further rotate the sectional material, bristles on the brush plates arranged on the two sides in the box body make contact with the sectional material, the worker slides the box body again, the box body moves to the position under the water tank, and the water conveying structure releases a clean water source in the water tank; and a clean water source is sprayed in the box body, and the brush and the rotating profile are matched, so that the effects of spraying water, cleaning and deoiling the profile can be achieved.

column12: Dimension-adjustable cut-off mechanism for aluminum alloy casting rod machining

column13: The present invention relates to a contrast medium composition for the diagnosis of astrocytosis, the detection of reactive astrocytes, and the acquisition of an image of brain tumor margins. The present invention provides image information on various diseases accompanying excessive proliferation or activation of astrocyte and, particularly, provides highly reliable information on the margins between a lesion area and a surrounding normal area by presenting an exact location of a dense area of these cells. column12: CONTRAST AGENT COMPOSITION FOR DETECTING LESIONAL MARGINS OF ASTROCYTOSIS-RELATED DISEASES COMPRISING QUINOLINE DERIVATIVE AS ACTIVE INGREDIENT
column13: The present invention relates to a contrast agent composition for astrocytosis diagnosis, the detection of reactive astrocytes, and image acquisition for brain tumor margins. The present invention presents accurate locations of clustered areas of astrocytes in various diseases accompanied by excessive proliferation or activation of the cells and provides highly reliable information on margins between lesion areas and surrounding normal areas, and thus, particularly, can be effectively used in diagnostic imaging for image-guided surgery such as in surgical resection of brain tumors and the like. column13: Eine Leistungsübertragungsvorrichtung für ein Fahrzeug weist auf: eine erste Eingangswelle (IS1), welche immer ein Eingabedrehmoment von einem Verbrennungsmotor (ENG) erhält, eine zweite und eine dritte Eingangswelle (IS2, IS3), welche koaxial zur ersten Eingangswelle (IS1) angeordnet sind und mit der erste Eingangswelle (IS1) selektiv verbunden sind, eine Drehmomentvermittlungswelle (TMS), welche selektiv mit der ersten Eingangswelle (IS1) oder einem Getriebegehäuse (H) verbunden ist, eine erste und eine zweite Zwischenwelle (CS1, CS2) und eine Ausgangswelle (OS), welche jeweilig parallel zur ersten Eingangswelle (IS) angeordnet sind, einen ersten Vor-Schaltabschnitt (FT1), welcher ein Drehmoment mittels eines ersten Eingang-Radsatzes (IG1) erhält, selektiv das erhaltene Drehmoment schaltet und das geschaltete Drehmoment ausgibt, einen zweiten Vor-Schaltabschnitt (FT2), welcher einen zweiten Schalten-Radsatz (TG2), welcher ein Drehmoment von der ersten Eingangswelle (IS1) ausgibt und welcher stoppt, aufweist, und einen Verbund-Schaltabschnitt (CT), welcher ein Ausgangsdrehmoment durch das Eingabedrehmoment und das erste und das zweite geschaltete Drehmoment bildet.
